Posts.Content: Aug 10, 2009 03:11AM marvinr wrote: Anything loose and blousey. Avoid anything tight around the midriff or arms. Cotton things are good. You should be wearing compression stockinets an both arms from wrist to shoulder to keep edema down. You won't be working for awhile especially with drains in. The surgery takes a lot out of you. Your arm is going to be weak and sore you will need to be fitted for a prosthetic bra soon too. Total Mastectomy
